Forms

form is used to collect, validate, and submit the user input, usually contains various form items including checkbox, radio, input, select, and etc.

Login
Login form
Normal login form which can contain more elements.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form">
    <div class="pd-form-item required">
        <label for="userName" class="pd-form-label">User Name</label>
        <input type="text" id="userName" name="userName" required class="pd-form-control">
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item required">
        <label for="password" class="pd-form-label">Password</label>
        <div class="pd-control-wrapper">
            <input type="password" id="password" name="password" required class="pd-form-control pd-control">
            <div class="pd-control-suffix togglePassword">
                <svg viewBox="64 64 896 896" focusable="false" class="" data-icon="eye-invisible" width="1em" height="1em" fill="currentColor" aria-hidden="true">
                    <path d="M942.2 486.2Q889.47 375.11 816.7 305l-50.88 50.88C807.31 395.53 843.45 447.4 874.7 512 791.5 684.2 673.4 766 512 766q-72.67 0-133.87-22.38L323 798.75Q408 838 512 838q288.3 0 430.2-300.3a60.29 60.29 0 0 0 0-51.5zm-63.57-320.64L836 122.88a8 8 0 0 0-11.32 0L715.31 232.2Q624.86 186 512 186q-288.3 0-430.2 300.3a60.3 60.3 0 0 0 0 51.5q56.69 119.4 136.5 191.41L112.48 835a8 8 0 0 0 0 11.31L155.17 889a8 8 0 0 0 11.31 0l712.15-712.12a8 8 0 0 0 0-11.32zM149.3 512C232.6 339.8 350.7 258 512 258c54.54 0 104.13 9.36 149.12 28.39l-70.3 70.3a176 176 0 0 0-238.13 238.13l-83.42 83.42C223.1 637.49 183.3 582.28 149.3 512zm246.7 0a112.11 112.11 0 0 1 146.2-106.69L401.31 546.2A112 112 0 0 1 396 512z"></path>
                    <path d="M508 624c-3.46 0-6.87-.16-10.25-.47l-52.82 52.82a176.09 176.09 0 0 0 227.42-227.42l-52.82 52.82c.31 3.38.47 6.79.47 10.25a111.94 111.94 0 0 1-112 112z"></path>
                </svg>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <button type="submit" class="pd-btn block primary">Login</button>
</form>
Registration
Fill in this form to create a new account for you.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form horizontal">
    <div class="pd-form-item required">
        <label for="fullName" class="pd-form-label">Full Name</label>
        <input type="text" id="fullName" name="fullName" placeholder="fullName" class="pd-form-control">
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="adress" class="pd-form-label">Address</label>
        <input type="text" id="adress" name="adress" placeholder="address" class="pd-form-control">
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="gender" class="pd-form-label">Gender</label>
        <select id="gender" name="gender" class="pd-form-control">
            <option value="man">Man</option>
            <option value="woman">Woman</option>
        </select>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="message" class="pd-form-label">Message</label>
        <textarea id="message" name="message" cols="3" rows="5" class="pd-form-control"></textarea>
    </div>
</form>

Help
form validate.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form">
    <div class="pd-form-item required has-danger">
        <label for="item1" class="pd-form-label">Item1</label>
        <input type="text" id="item1" name="item1" class="pd-form-control">
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item has-success">
        <label for="item2" class="pd-form-label">Item2</label>
        <input type="text" id="item2" name="item2" class="pd-form-control">
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="item3" class="pd-form-label">Item3</label>
        <select id="item3" name="item3" class="pd-form-control">
            <option value="man">Man</option>
            <option value="woman">Woman</option>
        </select>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="item4" class="pd-form-label">Item4</label>
        <textarea id="item4" name="item4" cols="3" rows="5" class="pd-form-control"></textarea>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
</form>

Size
Input sizes.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form">
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="size1" class="pd-form-label">Size1</label>
        <input type="text" id="size1" name="size1" class="pd-form-control sm">
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="size2" class="pd-form-label">Size2</label>
        <input type="text" id="size2" name="size2" class="pd-form-control">
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="size3" class="pd-form-label">Size3</label>
        <input type="text" id="size3" name="size3" class="pd-form-control lg">
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="size4" class="pd-form-label">Size4</label>
        <select id="size4" name="size4" class="pd-form-control sm">
            <option value="1" selected>Option 1</option>
        </select>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="size5" class="pd-form-label">Size5</label>
        <select id="size5" name="size5" class="pd-form-control">
            <option value="1" selected>Option 1</option>
        </select>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item">
        <label for="size6" class="pd-form-label">Size6</label>
        <select id="size6" name="size6" class="pd-form-control lg">
            <option value="1" selected>Option 1</option>
        </select>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
</form>

Inner
Label inner.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form">
    <div class="pd-form-item inner">
        <label for="innerSize1" class="pd-form-label">Size1</label>
        <div class="pd-control-wrapper">
            <i class="pd-control-prefix pd-icon.pd-icon-pin"></i>
            <input type="text" id="innerSize1" class="pd-form-control pd-control sm">
        </div>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>

        </div>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>

                <option value="1" selected>Option 1</option>

Inner
Label inner.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form">
    <div class="pd-form-item inner required">
        <label for="innerSizeLabel1" class="pd-form-label">Label description</label>
        <div class="pd-control-group">
            <div class="pd-control-wrapper pd-control-group-input">
                <i class="pd-control-prefix pd-icon.pd-icon-pin"></i>
                <input type="text" id="innerSizeLabel1" class="pd-form-control pd-control sm">
            </div>
            <div class="pd-control-group-append">
                <button type="button" class="pd-btn icon iconCenter primary">
                    <i class="icon-search"></i>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item inner required">
        <label for="innerSizeLabel2" class="pd-form-label">Label description</label>
        <div class="pd-control-group">
            <div class="pd-control-wrapper pd-control-group-input">

                <input type="text" id="innerSizeLabel2" class="pd-form-control pd-control">
            </div>
            <div class="pd-control-group-append">
                <button type="button" class="pd-btn icon iconCenter primary">
                    <i class="icon-search"></i>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item inner required">
        <label for="innerSizeLabel3" class="pd-form-label">Label description</label>
        <div class="pd-control-group">
            <div class="pd-control-wrapper pd-control-group-input">
                <i class="pd-control-prefix pd-icon.pd-icon-pin"></i>
                <input type="text" id="innerSizeLabel3" class="pd-form-control pd-control lg">
            </div>
            <div class="pd-control-group-append">

                </button>
            </div>

    </div>
</form>

Outlined
Label outlined.
<form action="" method="post" class="pd-form">
    <div class="pd-form-item outlined">
        <input type="text" id="outlinedSize1" placeholder=" " class="pd-form-control sm">
        <label for="outlinedSize1" class="pd-form-label sm">Size1</label>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item outlined required">
        <input type="text" id="outlinedSize2" placeholder=" " class="pd-form-control">
        <label for="outlinedSize2" class="pd-form-label">Size2</label>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pd-form-item outlined">
        <input type="text" id="outlinedSize3" placeholder=" " class="pd-form-control lg">
        <label for="outlinedSize3" class="pd-form-label lg">Size3</label>
        <div class="pd-form-help">Help text</div>
    </div>
</form>

API

Property Class
form .pd-form
Orientation .horizontal
Item .pd-form-item.has-success.has-danger.required
control .pd-form-control
Help .pd-form-help
Size .sm.lg

Pdui CSS es una libreria Sass/Css minimalista.
